overview: Undoubtedly, Nicola Bryant’s portrayal of Perpugilliam Brown has become one of the most popular assistants in the history of Doctor Who.  When Nicholas Briggs first talked to Nicola in 1985, Doctor Who had been cancelled (for the first time) and its future was uncertain.  Eleven years later in 1996, they met again to discuss her last season in the programme and life after Doctor Who.  Both interviews are combined in this Myth Makers, giving us a fascinating insight into Nicola’s evolving life and career.
title: Myth Makers 6: Nicola Bryant
